Class Drawing

  • java.lang.Object
    • Drawing

  • public class Drawing
extends java.lang.Object
    A Drawing object is an array of non-overlapping Shape objects. The shapes do not have any positioning or orientation information.
    Author:
    tgk

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Drawing() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addShape(Shape s)
      Adds a shape to the drawing's array.
      double area()
      Calculates the total area of all the shapes in the drawing (unit of length is not specified).
      void describe()
      Prints out a description of each shape in the drawing.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
